dmca.title: Copyright Infringement - Immediate Response Required
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Jeffrey Bentley [mailto:jbentley@geosign.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2006 2:50 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: admin@travel-canadian.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement - Immediate Response Required



Good afternoon.  It was recently brought to my attention that a website
owned by our company, Geosign Corporation, has been stolen and hosted by
your company.  After repeated attempts, we have had not received a response
from the guilty party.  Please consider this a formal request to have the
site in question taken down - www.travel-canadian.com
<http://www.travel-canadian.com/> .  As you can see, this site is a copy of
our site - www.canadiantraveladventures.com
<http://www.canadiantraveladventures.com/> .  Geosign Corporation has
reserved all rights to this work, first published in July of 2004.  Please
contact me at your earliest convenience, so we can resolve this matter.  

 

Regards,

 

 

Jeffrey Bentley

 

Assistant to the Director of Search Strategies

Geosign Corporation

1-519-837-4436
